message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.CY, cs.SI 

The paper discusses the security challenges in cloud computing, which is a subfield of computer security (cs.CR). It also analyzes international and industrial standards targeting information security, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper proposes an extension to the ISO 27001:2005 standard, which is related to cybersecurity (cs.CY) and system and information theory (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR, followed by cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.CY, and cs.SI.
